p.e:
On this sacred ground we dedicate a memorial to the Great Creators who have left us. There
are many who have given us truly fantastic and memorable creations. Some of these players,
for reasons we may never know, have not returned to us. Perhaps they grew bored of us.
Or maybe, they simply evolved their creative energies into a more professional outlet. In any
case, we feel it is our duty to ensure that their names and wonderous deeds are never forgotten.
